pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 8, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay, will meet with Indigenous veterans to mark Indigenous Veterans Day.

Closed to media.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a hybrid format of the National Caucus meeting, where he will deliver opening remarks.

Room 225-A
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage of the opening remarks
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
